summary: This document is an email chain from October 2021 forwarding a 2020 email regarding a victim compensation application for a Jeffrey Epstein victim. The 2020 email includes an attached OVS application and indicates the victim plans to seek treatment with a specific therapist if approved.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the correspondence; the case involves his victims seeking compensation.

persons.name: Edwards Pottinger
persons.context: The law firm of the sender of the 2020 email, which is handling the victim's compensation application.

connections.description: Edwards Pottinger law firm is representing a victim of Jeffrey Epstein in a compensation claim.

events.title: Submission of Victim Compensation Application
events.description: An attorney from Edwards Pottinger LLC sends an OVS (Office of Victim Services) application for a Jeffrey Epstein victim.

events.title: Forwarding of Compensation Email
events.description: The 2020 email regarding the Epstein victim's compensation application is forwarded to another recipient.

keyFacts: A victim of Jeffrey Epstein is seeking compensation through an OVS (Office of Victim Services) application.
The law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC is handling the victim's compensation claim.
If the application is approved, the victim plans to seek treatment with a specific therapist (name redacted in text).
The correspondence shows ongoing legal and support processes for Epstein victims years after his death.
